verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and drop <S%H5197><s%> thy word toward <S%H413><s%> the holy places, <S%H4720><s%> and prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> to the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am against <S%H413><s%> thee, and will draw forth <S%H3318><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> out of his sheath, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8593><s%> and will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

Seeing then <S%H3282><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> shall my sword <S%H2719><s%> go forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his sheath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8593><s%> against <S%H413><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> from the south <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5045><s%> to the north: <S%H6828><s%>

That all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have drawn forth <S%H3318><s%> my sword <S%H2719><s%> out of his sheath: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8593><s%> it shall not <S%H3808><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

Sigh <S%H584><s%> therefore, thou <S%H859><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> with the breaking <S%H7670><s%> of thy loins; <S%H4975><s%> and with bitterness <S%H4814><s%> sigh <S%H584><s%> before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> they say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee, Wherefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> sighest <S%H584><s%> thou? <S%H859><s%> that thou shalt answer, <S%H559><s%> For <S%H413><s%> the tidings; <S%H8052><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it cometh: <S%H935><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> shall melt, <S%H4549><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> shall be feeble, <S%H7503><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> shall faint, <S%H3543><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> knees <S%H1290><s%> shall be weak <S%H1980><s%> as water: <S%H4325><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> it cometh, <S%H935><s%> and shall be brought to pass, <S%H1961><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H136><s%> Say, <S%H559><s%> A sword, <S%H2719><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> is sharpened, <S%H2300><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> furbished: <S%H4803><s%>

It is sharpened <S%H2300><s%> to <S%H4616><s%> make a sore slaughter; <S%H2873><s%> <S%H2874><s%> it is furbished <S%H4803><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> it may glitter: <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1300><s%> should we then <S%H176><s%> make mirth? <S%H7797><s%> it contemneth <S%H3988><s%> the rod <S%H7626><s%> of my son, <S%H1121><s%> as every <S%H3605><s%> tree. <S%H6086><s%>

And he hath given <S%H5414><s%> it to be furbished, <S%H4803><s%> that it may be handled: <S%H8610><s%> <S%H3709><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%> is sharpened, <S%H2300><s%> and it <S%H1931><s%> is furbished, <S%H4803><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the slayer. <S%H2026><s%>

Cry <S%H2199><s%> and howl, <S%H3213><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man: <S%H120><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon my people, <S%H5971><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> shall be upon all <S%H3605><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> terrors <S%H4048><s%> by reason of <S%H413><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H854><s%> my people: <S%H5971><s%> smite <S%H5606><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> thy thigh. <S%H3409><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> it is a trial, <S%H974><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> if <S%H518><s%> the sword contemn <S%H3988><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> the rod? <S%H7626><s%> it shall be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> therefore, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and smite thine hands together, <S%H5221><s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3709><s%> and let the sword <S%H2719><s%> be doubled <S%H3717><s%> the third time, <S%H7992><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the slain: <S%H2491><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> men that are slain, <S%H2491><s%> which entereth into their privy chambers. <S%H2314><s%>

I have set <S%H5414><s%> the point <S%H19><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their gates, <S%H8179><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> may faint, <S%H4127><s%> and their ruins <S%H4383><s%> be multiplied: <S%H7235><s%> ah! <S%H253><s%> it is made bright, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H1300><s%> it is wrapped up <S%H4593><s%> for the slaughter. <S%H2874><s%>
Go thee one way or other, <S%H258><s%> either on the right hand, <S%H3231><s%> or on the left, <S%H8041><s%> whithersoever <S%H575><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> is set. <S%H3259><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> will also <S%H1571><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> mine hands together, <S%H3709><s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3709><s%> and I will cause my fury <S%H2534><s%> to rest: <S%H5117><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have said <S%H1696><s%> it.
The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me again, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Also, thou <S%H859><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> appoint <S%H7760><s%> thee two <S%H8147><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> that the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> may come: <S%H935><s%> both twain <S%H8147><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of one land: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> <S%H259><s%> and choose <S%H1254><s%> thou a place, <S%H3027><s%> choose <S%H1254><s%> it at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> to the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Appoint <S%H7760><s%> a way, <S%H1870><s%> that the sword <S%H2719><s%> may come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H854><s%> Rabbath <S%H7237><s%> of the Ammonites, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%> and to <S%H854><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> the defensed. <S%H1219><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the parting <S%H517><s%> of the way, <S%H1870><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> to use <S%H7080><s%> divination: <S%H7081><s%> he made his arrows bright, <S%H7043><s%> <S%H2671><s%> he consulted <S%H7592><s%> with images, <S%H8655><s%> he looked <S%H7200><s%> in the liver. <S%H3516><s%>

At his right hand <S%H3225><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> the divination <S%H7081><s%> for Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to appoint <S%H7760><s%> captains, <S%H3733><s%> to open <S%H6605><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the slaughter, <S%H7524><s%> to lift up <S%H7311><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> with shouting, <S%H8643><s%> to appoint <S%H7760><s%> battering rams <S%H3733><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the gates, <S%H8179><s%> to cast <S%H8210><s%> a mount, <S%H5550><s%> and to build <S%H1129><s%> a fort. <S%H1785><s%>

And it shall be <S%H1961><s%> unto them as a false <S%H7723><s%> divination <S%H7080><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> to them that have sworn <S%H7650><s%> oaths: <S%H7621><s%> but he <S%H1931><s%> will call to remembrance <S%H2142><s%> the iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> that they may be taken. <S%H8610><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> ye have made your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to be remembered, <S%H2142><s%> in that your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> are discovered, <S%H1540><s%> so that in all <S%H3605><s%> your doings <S%H5949><s%> your sins <S%H2403><s%> do appear; <S%H7200><s%> because, <S%H3282><s%> I say, that ye are come to remembrance, <S%H2142><s%> ye shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> with the hand. <S%H3709><s%>

And thou, <S%H859><s%> profane <S%H2491><s%> wicked <S%H7563><s%> prince <S%H5387><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> when <S%H6256><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall have an end, <S%H7093><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Remove <S%H5493><s%> the diadem, <S%H4701><s%> and take off <S%H7311><s%> the crown: <S%H5850><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be the same: <S%H2063><s%> exalt <S%H1361><s%> him that is low, <S%H8217><s%> and abase <S%H8213><s%> him that is high. <S%H1364><s%>

I will <S%H7760><s%> overturn, <S%H5754><s%> overturn, <S%H5754><s%> overturn, <S%H5754><s%> it: and <S%H1571><s%> it <S%H2063><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more, until <S%H5704><s%> he come <S%H935><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> right <S%H4941><s%> it is; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it him.

And thou, <S%H859><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> the Ammonites, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5983><s%> and concerning <S%H413><s%> their reproach; <S%H2781><s%> even say <S%H559><s%> thou, The sword, <S%H2719><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> is drawn: <S%H6605><s%> for the slaughter <S%H2874><s%> it is furbished, <S%H4803><s%> to consume <S%H3557><s%> because of <S%H4616><s%> the glittering: <S%H1300><s%>

While they see <S%H2372><s%> vanity <S%H7723><s%> unto thee, while they divine <S%H7080><s%> a lie <S%H3577><s%> unto thee, to bring <S%H5414><s%> thee upon <S%H413><s%> the necks <S%H6677><s%> of them that are slain, <S%H2491><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> is come, <S%H935><s%> when <S%H6256><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall have an end. <S%H7093><s%>

Shall I cause it to return <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> his sheath? <S%H8593><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> thee in the place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> thou wast created, <S%H1254><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of thy nativity. <S%H4351><s%>

And I will pour out <S%H8210><s%> mine indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thee, I will blow <S%H6315><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath, <S%H5678><s%> and deliver <S%H5414><s%> thee into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of brutish <S%H1197><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and skillful <S%H2796><s%> to destroy. <S%H4889><s%>

Thou shalt be <S%H1961><s%> for fuel <S%H402><s%> to the fire; <S%H784><s%> thy blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%> thou shalt be no <S%H3808><s%> more remembered: <S%H2142><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.
